name: Dark Seal
summary:
Fantasy hack and slash game with a lot of digital speech. Nice graphics with a Gauntlet-like gameplay. Up to four people can play at the same time. 
Nihon Bussan/AV Japan, the Dark Seal maker, released 142 different machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1978. 
 
Other machines made by Nihon Bussan/AV Japan during the time period Dark Seal was produced include Super BurgerTime, Edward Randy, Boulder Dash, Two Crude, Joe & Mac - Ikusae Genshizin, Sly Spy, Trio The Punch - Never Forget Me..., Secret Agent, Hippodrome, and Mad Motor.
